name: Hamlet
tagline: Hamlet the play is Analyzed here
body:
Hamlet
======

Hamlet the play is Analyzed here


========
##Terms
Exeunt all = Soliloquy
Everlasting = God
Self-slaughter = Suicide

Hamlet is Contemplating Suicide


Response to Before You Read, Act II
I would feel kinda mad if someone betrayed me (Unless They did it out of concern for me)


Two Themes: Betrayal and Appearance vs Reality
Rosencrantz & Guildenstern betrays Hamlet 
Claudius kills Hamlet Sr. And 
queen betrays king
Posing Question : is Hamlet Crazy?
Actors. Represent Appearance vs Reality
queen = Gertrude
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
